entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Azure Pipelines / runtime (Formatting windows x64) fails #61331
  • Installed .NET 6.0 and RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription property is returning incorrect version. #61330
  • [DllImportGenerator] Update `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` handling of character set / encoding #61326
    7.0.0
  • CryptoStream calling flush when only reads have been performed #61325
  • dictionaryexpansion tests failing on Mono #61322
  • Regex Source generator is not currently part of the .NETCore ref-pack #61321
  • XSD.exe does not work with .NET Core assemblies #61319
  • MaxBy inconsistent results with tie-breaks #61317
  • [Discussion] Setting config values in `IConfigurationSection` #61314
  • Unable to get EMSDK version when evaluating NativeFileReference in nuget package props or targets #61306
  • HTTPListener may not close the TCP port properly after Exception #61303
  • CertificateRequestChainTests tests may be subject to DST "fall back" spurious failures #61302
  • Writing files on a thread which are already open for reading on a different thread fails. #61301
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsTest/GenericsTest.sh #61300
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/DictionaryExpansion/DictionaryExpansion/DictionaryExpansion.sh #61299

Closed

  • CngKey.IsMachineKey is always false #45759
    Future
  • ValidateInterfaceImplTable enforces bogus ordering rules #60454
    7.0.0
  • Does the TPL Dataflow support the ImmediateTaskScheduler? #61318
  • TypeLoadException: The generic type '<>A{00000004}`3' was used with an invalid instantiation in assembly 'kktsxund.iql, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null'. #61316
  • [Blazor WASM VS 2022 Preview] Breakpoints not being hit in Visual Studio #61310
  • [MonoVM] crash when call internal call function duration `mono_runtime_delegate_invoke` #61253
  • Add direct support for structs when deserializing with System.Text.Json.Serialization #61264
  • Infrastructure - Rollout (November 2021) #60826
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix format.py to use jit-format.exe, not jit-format.bat #61334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix binplacing for (impl) System.Security.Cryptography.Encoding.dll #61333
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix: add missed open curly #61332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Adding Regex source generator to Microsoft.netcore.app.ref pack #61329
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Add task marshaling tests. #61324
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM (#60701) #61323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Remove WasmBuildTemplate #61315
    area-Build-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [TEST ONLY] Test stress build refactor #61311
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [release/6.0][mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` (#6… #61305
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix: add missed open curly #61320
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove sorting requirement for interface lists #60541
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61193
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] accept empty realm for digest auth (#56369) #61203
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 5.0.13
  • Type key hash tweaks. #61234
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • Removing `m_hostAssemblyMap` and ceremony around it #61292
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable global constant propagation for `GT_LCL_FLD` #61209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add console version of browser-bench sample #60733
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [arm64] JIT: Enable CSE/hoisting for "arrayBase + elementOffset" #61293
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly mark tests with CLRTestKind=SharedLibrary #61235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • Provide PEM implementations for AsymmetricAlgorithm. #61284
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add additional steps in gcc validation leg #61241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1459821 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Alternative fix of #60182 #60298
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: extend redundant relop to handle side effects #61275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #61271
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix for #60532 #61240
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use conditional statement instead of switch in System.Linq.Enumerable #61215
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61283
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Proper VNs for zeroed structs #61285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Use diffed bytes for jit-analyze and print more info #61254
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodInfoFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61298
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Build improvements #61276
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
